text: Malcolm Peter Jarvis was born 6 December, 1955 in Masvingo, Zimbabwe. He is a Zimbabwean cricketer who played 5 tests and 12 one-day internationals between 1987 and 1995. He is the father of Zimbabwean cricketer Kyle Jarvis. ==Other websites== * http://content-aus.cricinfo.com/ci/content/player/55525.html from Cricinfo Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Zimbabwean cricketers
title: Malcolm Jarvis
